title: BRIEF-Delta Air Lines To Launch New Seasonal Service To Rome From Boston In 2020
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-Delta Air Lines To Launch New Seasonal Service To Rome From Boston In 2020

Sept 23 (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines Inc (NYSE: ) DAL.N :

* DELTA AIR LINES INC - IN 2020, DELTA WILL LAUNCH FOUR NEW TRANS-ATLANTIC FLIGHTS FROM BOSTON, INCLUDING NEW SEASONAL SERVICE TO ROME

* DELTA AIR LINES INC - IN 2020, DELTA WILL LAUNCH FOUR NEW TRANS-ATLANTIC FLIGHTS FROM BOSTON, INCLUDING CARRIER'S SECOND DAILY FLIGHT TO PARIS

* DELTA AIR LINES INC - IN 2020, DELTA WILL LAUNCH FOUR NEW TRANS-ATLANTIC FLIGHTS FROM BOSTON, INCLUDING NEW SERVICE TO LONDON-GATWICK AND MANCHESTER

* DELTA AIR LINES INC - DELTA IS ALSO LAUNCHING NEW SERVICE TO MUMBAI AND BOGOTA IN DEC. 2019

* DELTA AIR LINES - CO'S SEASONAL SERVICE BETWEEN ITS SALT LAKE CITY INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT HUB & LONDON-HEATHROW WILL BECOME YEAR-ROUND BEGINNING DEC. 19

* DELTA AIR LINES INC - CARRIER IS EXPANDING THE OPERATING SEASON BETWEEN TAMPA AND AMSTERDAM IN 2020
description: BRIEF-Delta Air Lines To Launch New Seasonal Service To Rome From Boston In 2020
